DOC.detailed_description: The study focus number patient move persistent Atrial Fibrillation function cumulative % Vp ( < > 40 % ) , general dual-chamber pacemaker population 2 year follow-up ( n=2188 ) . The endpoint analyze sub population ( Sinus Node Disease AVB ) 4 year follow ( n=4290 ) .
DOC.criteria: Patient implant ( primoimplant , replacement , upgrade ) dual chamber pacemaker less two month implant inclusion . Contraindicated cardiac pacing , accord ESC ACC/AHA/HRS guideline Permanent persistent atrial tachyarrhythmia
